sprint.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to run very fast for a short distance
sprint.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to ride, swim etc very fast for a short distance
sprint.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a short race in which the runners, riders, swimmers etc move very fast over a short distance
sprint.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a short period of running or moving very fast
sprint.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: He made a desperate sprint for the train.
